short_summary: Supply dangerous goods publications. Amend closing time
description: Canada seeks offers to deliver dangerous publications. All work to be completed byMay 15, 2023.
full_summary:
W0113-23CS45 Dangerous Goods Publications
=============================================

### Government Tender Announcement

#### Reference

*   Reference Number (numéro de référence): WS3893130783-Doc3901186151
*   Solicitation Number (numéro de sollicitation): WS3893130783
*   Amendment Number (numéro de modification): 1

#### Details

*   **Offeror/Contractor Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) / Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC)**
*   **Address (Adresse):** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
*   **End User Entity (Entité utilisateur finale): Department of National Defence (DND)** / Ministère de la Défense nationale (MDN)
*   **Address (Adresse):** 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2, Canada
*   **Procurement Method (Méthode d'approvisionnement):** Competitive - Open bidding (concurrentielle - invitation ouverte à soumissionner)
*   **Trade Agreements (Accords commerciaux):** None (Aucun)
*   **UNSPSC Codes (Codes UNSPSC):** *55101524* (Reference books / Livres de référence)

#### Tendering Requirements

*   **Goods to be delivered (Biens à livrer):** Various dangerous goods publications to Department of National Defence – CFB Borden
*   **Deliverable by:** 2023-05-15
*   **Tender submission deadline (Date limite de remise des offres):** 2023-03-21, 2:00 PM EDT (14:00 HAE) **only**
*   **Late bids (Soumission tardive):** Will be deemed non-responsive

#### Contact Information

*   Name (Nom): David Barltrop (TPSGC-PWGSC)
*   Email (Courriel): david.barltrop@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
*   Notice URL (URL notice): http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15590837?extsite=MTU1OTA4MzdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
